name: Minute ticks 1
description:
This is a submission to the No code Jam #2.

This is a big deal to me because I had History, Geography and Civics in a 1 form exam today and needed to study. Even though you can't find any 1 minute in this, this actually says that 1 MINUTE IS A FATE!!!

Anyways,

Plz check out my press 1 to win game, another stupid game!!!

And I hope you like it.

Trust me, I'm 11 year old (and the codes are out of bound)

This game is made in scratch.

This is a point 'n click game!

By

Mr.StiK
